translated: The nun should not rise from her seat means that if one who is not a monk comes, the nun should not rise from her seat.

original: dge bsnyen gyis kyang bsod snyoms byin zhes pa ni de la dge bsnyen dag gis kyang bsod snyoms ni byin cig pa'o //
analyzed: dge bsnyen gyis kyang bsod snyoms byin zhes pa ni de la dge bsnyen dag gis kyang bsod snyoms ni byin cig pa'o //
translated: The lay follower should also give alms means that the lay followers should also give alms to him.

original: 'di dag tshangs su zin kyang 'dum pa ma rnyed kyi bar du 'dum mi skye zhes pa ni gong ma ltar dge 'dun so sor bya ba las slar tshangs su zin kyang dge 'dun gyis 'dum bar ma byas kyi bar du mthun pa mi 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag tshangs su zin kyang 'dum pa ma rnyed kyi bar du 'dum mi skye zhes pa ni gong ma ltar dge 'dun so sor bya ba las slar tshangs su zin kyang dge 'dun gyis 'dum bar ma byas kyi bar du mthun pa mi 'grub pa'o //
translated: Even if they are purified, harmony does not arise until reconciliation is obtained means that even if the Saṅgha is purified from acting separately as above, harmony is not accomplished until the Saṅgha performs reconciliation.

original: gso sbyin ma byas par rang bzhin du gnas pa mi 'thob ces pa ni de ltar bye ba las slar 'dum pa'i dge 'dun gyis gso sbyin ma byas kyi bar du sngon gyi sor mi chud pa'o //
analyzed: gso sbyin ma byas par rang bzhin du gnas pa mi 'thob ces pa ni de ltar bye ba las slar 'dum pa'i dge 'dun gyis gso sbyin ma byas kyi bar du sngon gyi sor mi chud pa'o //
translated: The statement, One who has not performed the confessional rite does not obtain the natural state, means that until the Saṅgha that has been split in that way is reconciled, the former state is not restored.

original: 'di @245b ni sbyin zhing bya zhes pa ni sngar sbyin pa'i chos je byas pa'i 'og tu gso sbyin gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di @245b ni sbyin zhing bya zhes pa ni sngar sbyin pa'i chos je byas pa'i 'og tu gso sbyin gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The statement, This is to be given and done, means that after the rite of giving has been performed, it is to be done by the confessional rite.

original: sdar sbyin pa ji lta bu zhe na 'di las kyis so zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: sdar sbyin pa ji lta bu zhe na 'di las kyis so zhes pa yin te /
translated: What is the giving like? It is said, By this rite.

original: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gso sbyin pa'i las je byas la de'i 'og tu gdod gso sbyin ngo bo gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis gso sbyin pa'i las je byas la de'i 'og tu gdod gso sbyin ngo bo gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The rite of giving the confessional rite is to be performed by the rite of proposal and four parts. After that, the confessional rite is to be performed.

original: snga ma yang zhes pa ni snga ma sde 'dum pa yang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las je byas na gdod 'dum par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: snga ma yang zhes pa ni snga ma sde 'dum pa yang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las je byas na gdod 'dum par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The statement, The former also, means that the former reconciliation is also to be performed by the rite of proposal and four parts.

original: 'dum pa dang bkra shis pa dang ye 'drog gi phyir gso sbyin rung zhes pa ni dge 'dun bye ba las 'dum pa'i phyir gso sbyin pa dang chos ma yin pa dang / ltas ngan byung ba'i phyir gso sbyin bya ba dang / nad pa la sogs pa ye 'drog gi phyir gso sbyin bya ba rnams mi rung ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dum pa dang bkra shis pa dang ye 'drog gi phyir gso sbyin rung zhes pa ni dge 'dun bye ba las 'dum pa'i phyir gso sbyin pa dang chos ma yin pa dang / ltas ngan byung ba'i phyir gso sbyin bya ba dang / nad pa la sogs pa ye 'drog gi phyir gso sbyin bya ba rnams mi rung ba med pa'o //
translated: The phrase it is proper to perform the poṣadha for the sake of reconciliation, good fortune, and calamity means that it is proper to perform the poṣadha for the sake of reconciling a schism in the saṅgha, to perform the poṣadha for the sake of the non-dharma and bad omens that have arisen, and to perform the poṣadha for the sake of the calamities of the sick and so on.

original: 'di'i dus ni 'di nyid kyi gzhi las so zhes pa ni gong ma ltar gso sbyin bya ba ni bcu bzhi'am bco lnga tshes grangs dang sbyar ba med kyi de lta bu byung ba'i tshe gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i dus ni 'di nyid kyi gzhi las so zhes pa ni gong ma ltar gso sbyin bya ba ni bcu bzhi'am bco lnga tshes grangs dang sbyar ba med kyi de lta bu byung ba'i tshe gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The phrase its time is from this very basis means that the performance of the poṣadha is not connected with the fourteenth or fifteenth of the lunar month as above, but rather that it should be performed when such an occasion arises.

original: las byed pa'i dngos po'o /
analyzed: las byed pa'i dngos po'o /
translated: This concludes the section on the rite of the poṣadha.

original: // / las kyi bye ba dngos po zhus pa las 'byung ba dang / ma na big las 'byung ba bsdus te ston pa ni chos ma yin par smras pas mtshams kyi nang du dbye ba'i bsam pas las gud du byas na bye ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: // / las kyi bye ba dngos po zhus pa las 'byung ba dang / ma na big las 'byung ba bsdus te ston pa ni chos ma yin par smras pas mtshams kyi nang du dbye ba'i bsam pas las gud du byas na bye ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The summary of the topics of the divisions of actions and the topics of the Maṇḍala-vidhi is stated: “By speaking non-dharma, if one performs an action with the intention of dividing the saṅgha within the boundary, it is a division.”

original: chos ma yin par lta bas mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun gzhan dang bye yang bla bar bsams te las logs shig tu byas na bye bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin par lta bas mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun gzhan dang bye yang bla bar bsams te las logs shig tu byas na bye bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: By the view of non-dharma, if one thinks that it is good to divide the saṅgha within the boundary, and performs an action separately, it is a division.

original: 'di dag so so'i las su mi rung ba zhes pa dang / nyid kyi phyogs ma yin na mi rung zhes pa ni de ltar so sor byed na /
analyzed: 'di dag so so'i las su mi rung ba zhes pa dang / nyid kyi phyogs ma yin na mi rung zhes pa ni de ltar so sor byed na /
translated: “These are not suitable for individual actions” and “if one’s own position is not suitable” means that if one acts in that way individually,

original: so so'i phyogs kyi las su rung gis bsnol mar ni mi rung ba'o //
analyzed: so so'i phyogs kyi las su rung gis bsnol mar ni mi rung ba'o //
translated: it is not suitable to combine individual positions.

original: chos smra bas byas pa ni dge 'dun gyis byas pa'o zhes pa ni chos kyi phyogs su lta ba rnams kyis mtshams gcod cing dgrol ba la sogs pa'i las byas pa ni dge 'dun gzhan gyis las su rung ba'o //
analyzed: chos smra bas byas pa ni dge 'dun gyis byas pa'o zhes pa ni chos kyi phyogs su lta ba rnams kyis mtshams gcod cing dgrol ba la sogs pa'i las byas pa ni dge 'dun gzhan gyis las su rung ba'o //
translated: The one who is a Dharma speaker is the one who is the Saṅgha. This is to say, when those who are on the side of the Dharma do the actions of closing the boundary and releasing it, etc., the Saṅgha is fit for the action.

original: skam la gnas pa yod na des dge slong mas lung sbyin zhes pa ni rtsod pa'i 'dam du ma song ba'i skam la 'dug pas dge slong ma'i lung byin cig pa'o //
analyzed: skam la gnas pa yod na des dge slong mas lung sbyin zhes pa ni rtsod pa'i 'dam du ma song ba'i skam la 'dug pas dge slong ma'i lung byin cig pa'o //
translated: If there is one who is on dry land, he should give the instruction to the nuns. This is to say, one who is on dry land, who has not gone into the swamp of dispute, should give the instruction to the nuns.

original: 'di dag chos kyi phyogs pas bskal bar 'gyur zhes pa ni skam la gnas pa 'di lta bu mtshams kyi nang na yod de ma dris par las byas na /
analyzed: 'di dag chos kyi phyogs pas bskal bar 'gyur zhes pa ni skam la gnas pa 'di lta bu mtshams kyi nang na yod de ma dris par las byas na /
translated: These are the ones who are on the side of the Dharma. This is to say, if there is one who is on dry land like this inside the boundary, and one does the action without asking him,

original: las gcod pa la sogs par 'gyur bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: las gcod pa la sogs par 'gyur bar ston pa'o //
translated: it is taught that the action will be cut off, etc.

original: yo na de nyid 'jig ces pa ni skam la gnas pa de phyogs gcig gi rjes su bltas pa 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: yo na de nyid 'jig ces pa ni skam la gnas pa de phyogs gcig gi rjes su bltas pa 'jig par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If he is on dry land, that very one is destroyed. This is to say, if he who is on dry land looks after one side, he is destroyed.

original: 'di mi bya zhes pa ni 'di lta bas na skam la gnas pa de phyogs gcig tu lta bar ma byed cig pa'o //🔽dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang phyogs dang @246a * //
analyzed: 'di mi bya zhes pa ni 'di lta bas na skam la gnas pa de phyogs gcig tu lta bar ma byed cig pa'o // dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang phyogs dang @246a * //
translated: The words one should not do this mean: Therefore, one who is on dry land should not look in one direction.

original: phyogs gzhan du bltas kyang lung sbyin zhes pa ni dge slong ma'i dge 'dun so sor chad du byed pa'i tshe lung byin cig pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs gzhan du bltas kyang lung sbyin zhes pa ni dge slong ma'i dge 'dun so sor chad du byed pa'i tshe lung byin cig pa'o //
translated: The words one should give the precepts to the community of nuns mean: When the community of nuns is divided into factions, one should give the precepts.

original: bye na ni 'di ma yin zhes pa ni so sor shag por byed na ni lung ma byin cig pa'o //
analyzed: bye na ni 'di ma yin zhes pa ni so sor shag por byed na ni lung ma byin cig pa'o //
translated: The words if they are divided, it is not this mean: If they are divided into factions, one should not give the precepts.

original: gsol na 'dum du gzhug ces pa ni de dag lung dbog par gsol na khyed ci 'dum par gyis shig dang / gdod lung sbyin no gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: gsol na 'dum du gzhug ces pa ni de dag lung dbog par gsol na khyed ci 'dum par gyis shig dang / gdod lung sbyin no gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The words if they request, one should reconcile them mean: If they request the precepts, you should reconcile them, and only then will I give the precepts.

original: dbyar gyi chos smra bar 'gro zhes pa ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa rnams chos smra ba dbang ba'o //
analyzed: dbyar gyi chos smra bar 'gro zhes pa ni dbyar gyi rnyed pa rnams chos smra ba dbang ba'o //
translated: The words one should go to the Dharma teacher in the rainy season mean: The gains of the rainy season belong to the Dharma teacher.

original: 'dus pa gnyis las ma bgos par sbom du byin cig pa'o zhes pa ni bye ba'i dge 'dun sde gnyis la yon bdag gis so sor ma bgos par spyi ril du phul na chos smra ba rnams dbang bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus pa gnyis las ma bgos par sbom du byin cig pa'o zhes pa ni bye ba'i dge 'dun sde gnyis la yon bdag gis so sor ma bgos par spyi ril du phul na chos smra ba rnams dbang bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If the donors do not divide the offerings between the two assemblies, the Dharma teachers should take the whole.

original: kun du 'ang de 'am zhe na /🔽de dag kyang dge 'dun du tshang bar 'gyur na'o zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: kun du 'ang de 'am zhe na / de dag kyang dge 'dun du tshang bar 'gyur na'o zhes pa yin te /
translated: If the Dharma teachers are not divided, then what?🔽 If the Dharma teachers are complete in the assembly, then they should do as above.

original: chos smra ba'i phyogs rnams dge 'dun du tshang na gdod gong ma ltar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: chos smra ba'i phyogs rnams dge 'dun du tshang na gdod gong ma ltar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If the Dharma teachers are complete in the assembly, then they should do as above.

original: gal te ma tshang na ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ma tshang na ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: If they are incomplete, what should be done?

original: gal te gzhan ma tshang la de dag na gang gi thu par 'ongs pa'o zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te gzhan ma tshang la de dag na gang gi thu par 'ongs pa'o zhes pa yin te /
translated: If the others are incomplete, then those who have come to the majority should take it.🔽 If the Dharma teachers are incomplete in the assembly, then those who have come to the majority of the non-Dharma teachers should take it.

original: chos kyi phyogs su lta ba ni dge 'dun du ma tshang ba chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su lta ba rnams dge 'dun du tshang na gang gi thu bar 'ongs par dbang ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi phyogs su lta ba ni dge 'dun du ma tshang ba chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su lta ba rnams dge 'dun du tshang na gang gi thu bar 'ongs par dbang ba'o //
translated: If the Dharma teachers are complete in the assembly, then those who have come to the majority of the Dharma teachers should take it.

original: mdun du bzhag pa'ang de bzhin gal te gnyi ga'i thu bar 'ongs na ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: mdun du bzhag pa'ang de bzhin gal te gnyi ga'i thu bar 'ongs na ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: If it comes to both, what should be done?

original: gnyis kar na gnyi ga'o zhes pa ni gnyis ka'i thu bar 'ongs na gnyis ka dbang ba'o //
analyzed: gnyis kar na gnyi ga'o zhes pa ni gnyis ka'i thu bar 'ongs na gnyis ka dbang ba'o //
translated: If it comes to both, both have power.

original: bgo ba'i thabs ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: bgo ba'i thabs ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How should the method of distribution be done?

original: dge 'dun du ma yin gyi gang zag gi skal bas so zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: dge 'dun du ma yin gyi gang zag gi skal bas so zhes pa yin te /
translated: It is not for the Saṅgha, but for the portion of the individual.

original: dge 'dun gyi sde gnyis dga' bar byed shas su bgo ba ma yin gyi gang zag gi grangs mang nyung gi shas su bgos shig pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi sde gnyis dga' bar byed shas su bgo ba ma yin gyi gang zag gi grangs mang nyung gi shas su bgos shig pa'o //
translated: It is not that the two groups of the Saṅgha should distribute it with joy, but it should be distributed according to the portion of the many or few individuals.

original: las kyi phye ba'i dngos por gtogs pa zhus pa dang ma na pa'i ka'o //
analyzed: las kyi phye ba'i dngos por gtogs pa zhus pa dang ma na pa'i ka'o //
translated: This is the section on the matter of the division of work, the request and the sick person.

original: 'khor los bye ba'i dngos por ston pa ni gcugs gzhug pa'i phyir gsol ba 'am tshul shing len du btsud pas chos dang bral ba ni dge 'dun phye ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khor los bye ba'i dngos por ston pa ni gcugs gzhug pa'i phyir gsol ba 'am tshul shing len du btsud pas chos dang bral ba ni dge 'dun phye ba'o zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The explanation of the matter of the division of the wheel is: For the sake of reconciliation, if one is made to request or take a voting stick, being separated from the Dharma is a division of the Saṅgha.

original: 'phags pa'i lam dang bral ba'i gso ba'am tshul shing len du btsud pas gcugs bcug na dge 'dun bye ba yin bar ston pa'o //

translated: If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.

original: phye'o cog gis mtshams med par 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: phye'o cog gis mtshams med par 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha.🔽If the Saṅgha is not complete, then the schismatic is not a Saṅgha

original: chos dang chos ma yin pa kho na gdod yod bzhin na mtshams med pa'o zhes pa ni chos dang chos ma yin par shes bzhin du gcugs bcug ste phye na gdod mtshams med par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: chos dang chos ma yin pa kho na gdod yod bzhin na mtshams med pa'o zhes pa ni chos dang chos ma yin par shes bzhin du gcugs bcug ste phye na gdod mtshams med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: If one divides the Saṅgha while knowing Dharma and non-Dharma, then it becomes a heinous act.🔽If one divides the Saṅgha with the perception of Dharma, even if there is a remainder of nirvāṇa, it becomes a heinous act.

original: chos kyi 'du shes phye na yang zhes pa ni lhag ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa las bzlog pa ni 'dod khams kyi dbang po la phan btags par 'du shes pa lta bu phan gdags pa'am bsod nams kyi 'du shes kyis phye na yang mtshams med🔽par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'du shes phye na yang zhes pa ni lhag ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa las bzlog pa ni 'dod khams kyi dbang po la phan btags par 'du shes pa lta bu phan gdags pa'am bsod nams kyi 'du shes kyis phye na yang mtshams med par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: For example, if one benefits the faculties of the desire realm with the perception of benefiting or the perception of merit, it becomes a heinous act.

original: 'khor los phye ba'i dngos po'o /
analyzed: 'khor los phye ba'i dngos po'o /
translated: The basis of the wheel is divided.

original: // / rtsod pa'i dngos po ston pa ni 'khrug pa'i rgyu ni bzhi ste zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: // / rtsod pa'i dngos po ston pa ni 'khrug pa'i rgyu ni bzhi ste zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The explanation of the basis of dispute is the four causes of conflict, and so on.

original: 'khrug pa'i rgyu rnam pa bzhi yod par ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrug pa'i rgyu rnam pa bzhi yod par ston pa'o //
translated: It shows that there are four types of causes of conflict.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: dngos po don de kho na nyid la kha mi 'dum pa dang / spang ba dang nyes pa can dang las 'dum pa mi ster ba rnams so zhes pa yin te mi mthun pas rtsod pa'i rgyu ni dngos po'i don //🔽rtag chad la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid la kha mi 'dum pa las 'byung ba nyid dang lung mi ster bar rtsod pa'i rgyu gso sbyin dang tshul nas 'byung ba las spangs shing bkyigs pa las 'byung ba dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rgyu nyes pa yod med las 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: dngos po don de kho na nyid la kha mi 'dum pa dang / spang ba dang nyes pa can dang las 'dum pa mi ster ba rnams so zhes pa yin te mi mthun pas rtsod pa'i rgyu ni dngos po'i don // rtag chad la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid la kha mi 'dum pa las 'byung ba nyid dang lung mi ster bar rtsod pa'i rgyu gso sbyin dang tshul nas 'byung ba las spangs shing bkyigs pa las 'byung ba dang / ltung ba'i rtsod pa'i rgyu nyes pa yod med las 'byung ba dang /
translated: The causes of disputes are:🔽the meaning of things, non-agreement on reality,🔽non-agreement on the meaning of the scriptures,🔽non-agreement on the meaning of the Vinaya,🔽non-agreement on the meaning of downfalls,🔽and non-agreement on the meaning of actions.

original: bya bas rtsod pa'i rgyu las 'dur mi btub pa las 'byung ba rnams su ston pa'o //
analyzed: bya bas rtsod pa'i rgyu las 'dur mi btub pa las 'byung ba rnams su ston pa'o //
translated: The causes of disputes are shown to be: the meaning of things, non-agreement on the meaning of things, the meaning of the scriptures, non-agreement on the meaning of the scriptures, the meaning of the Vinaya, non-agreement on the meaning of the Vinaya, the meaning of downfalls, non-agreement on the meaning of downfalls, and the meaning of actions, non-agreement on the meaning of actions.

original: mtshan ma dang po ni grag par bya bas 'jil zhes pa ni dngos po don de kho na nyid la kha mi 'dum pas ni rtsod pa ni rtag chad la sogs pa gang gi phyir kha mi 'dum pa de gcig tu nges par g-yengs te bcad pas 'jil
analyzed: mtshan ma dang po ni grag par bya bas 'jil zhes pa ni dngos po don de kho na nyid la kha mi 'dum pas ni rtsod pa ni rtag chad la sogs pa gang gi phyir kha mi 'dum pa de gcig tu nges par g-yengs te bcad pas 'jil
translated: The first sign is: “It is destroyed by the sound of it.” Since one does not agree with the reality of that thing, one disputes it. Since one does not agree with anything, such as permanence or annihilation, one is distracted and destroyed by the certainty of that.

original: zhing slon par ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhing slon par ston pa'o //
translated: It is taught that one is destroyed by the sound of it.

original: mtshan ma gnyis pa ni 'di dang brtsangs pas so zhes pa ni spang ba la rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: mtshan ma gnyis pa ni 'di dang brtsangs pas so zhes pa ni spang ba la rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The second sign is: “It is destroyed by this and that.” Abandonment is of two kinds:

original: rgyu yod pa dang med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu yod pa dang med pa'o //
translated: having a cause and not having a cause.

original: de la rgyu yod pa ni nges par bcad pas zhi bar bya ba dang / rgyu med pa ni dran pa dang ma rmongs pa sbyin zhing brtsangs pas 'jil bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: de la rgyu yod pa ni nges par bcad pas zhi bar bya ba dang / rgyu med pa ni dran pa dang ma rmongs pa sbyin zhing brtsangs pas 'jil bar ston pa'o //
translated: Among them, having a cause is destroyed by the sound of it, by pacifying the certainty of it. Not having a cause is taught to be destroyed by giving and being courageous with mindfulness and nondelusion.

original: mtshan ma gsum pa ni bcos pa dang sems su bcug pas so zhes pa ni nyes pa can la'ang nyes par mngon pa dang / mi mngon pa gnyis yod de de la nyes par mngon pa ni gnyen po la brten du bcug cing bcos pas slon par ston pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan ma gsum pa ni bcos pa dang sems su bcug pas so zhes pa ni nyes pa can la'ang nyes par mngon pa dang / mi mngon pa gnyis yod de de la nyes par mngon pa ni gnyen po la brten du bcug cing bcos pas slon par ston pa dang /
translated: The third sign is that it is settled by the confession and by the mind.🔽This means that even in the case of a fault, there are two kinds: that in which the fault is manifest and that in which it is not manifest.🔽The fault that is manifest is settled by the confession in which one relies on the antidote and by the confession in which one is made to confess.

original: nyes par mngon pa ni dran pa tshol zhing sems su bcug pas @247a * //
analyzed: nyes par mngon pa ni dran pa tshol zhing sems su bcug pas @247a * //
translated: The fault that is not manifest is settled by the search for mindfulness and by the confession in which one is made to confess.

original: 'jil par ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'jil par ston pa'o //
translated: The last is settled by the casting of lots.

original: tha ma ni byin pas so zhes pa ni las la 'dur mi btub pas rtsod ba ni 'dur btsud pas zhi bar ston pa'o //🔽rtsod pa nyid kyis mchod na gzu bos bcad ces pa ni dge slong gnyis rtsod pa ma dum na gzu bos chod cig pa'o //
analyzed: tha ma ni byin pas so zhes pa ni las la 'dur mi btub pas rtsod ba ni 'dur btsud pas zhi bar ston pa'o // rtsod pa nyid kyis mchod na gzu bos bcad ces pa ni dge slong gnyis rtsod pa ma dum na gzu bos chod cig pa'o //
translated: This means that a dispute is settled by the casting of lots when one is not able to proceed in the work.🔽If the dispute is not settled by the dispute itself, it is settled by the casting of lots.🔽This means that if two monks do not settle their dispute, they should settle it by the casting of lots.

original: dge slong ngo yang zhes pa ni gzu bo de yang dge slong yin na'o //
analyzed: dge slong ngo yang zhes pa ni gzu bo de yang dge slong yin na'o //
translated: The lots are also monks.

original: dge slong ji lta bu zhe na /🔽'drang ba'o zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: dge slong ji lta bu zhe na / 'drang ba'o zhes pa yin te /
translated: What kind of monks?🔽The upright.

original: 'drang bas chod cig pa'o //
analyzed: 'drang bas chod cig pa'o //
translated: This means that they should settle it by the upright.

original: su 'drang zhe na /
analyzed: su 'drang zhe na /
translated: Who are the upright?

original: de dag ces pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag ces pa yin te /
translated: Those means:

original: rtsod pa dag 'drang ba'o //
analyzed: rtsod pa dag 'drang ba'o //
translated: They should settle disputes.

original: 'drang ba du zhe na gcig yan chad ces pa yin te /
analyzed: 'drang ba du zhe na gcig yan chad ces pa yin te /
translated: How many? At least one, means:

original: gzu bo gcig yan chad du'ang rung ba'o //
analyzed: gzu bo gcig yan chad du'ang rung ba'o //
translated: At least one person, means:

original: dge slong gcig la 'drang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: dge slong gcig la 'drang bar bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How should one settle a dispute with one monk?

original: skam la gnas pa la 'drang du gzud ces pa yin te /
analyzed: skam la gnas pa la 'drang du gzud ces pa yin te /
translated: One should settle a dispute with one who lives in the dry land, means:

original: skam la gnas pa'i dge slong de dag 'drang bar gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: skam la gnas pa'i dge slong de dag 'drang bar gyis shig pa'o //
translated: You should settle a dispute with those monks who live in the dry land.

original: 'di lta bu ni dge 'dun gyis gtan du bsko zhes pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i dge slong skam la gnas pa ni yang dge 'dun gyis gtan du skos shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu ni dge 'dun gyis gtan du bsko zhes pa ni rtsod pa zhi bar byed pa'i dge slong skam la gnas pa ni yang dge 'dun gyis gtan du skos shig pa'o //
translated: The Saṅgha should always appoint one like this, means: The Saṅgha should always appoint a monk who will settle disputes and who lives in the dry land.

original: ji lta bu las bsko zhe na /🔽'dir 'thab gcugs mi byed pa las bsko bar bya zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: ji lta bu las bsko zhe na / 'dir 'thab gcugs mi byed pa las bsko bar bya zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
translated: How should one be appointed?🔽One should be appointed who does not cause quarrels, etc.

original: ji nas kyang 'dum bar byed kyi rtsod par mi byed pa las skos shig pa'o //
analyzed: ji nas kyang 'dum bar byed kyi rtsod par mi byed pa las skos shig pa'o //
translated: You should appoint one who will reconcile, not cause disputes.

original: khrel yod cing bslab pa la gnan pa'o zhes pa ni bslab pa la gnan to cog la khrel yod pa dang / bslab pa la gnan ba las bskos shig pa'o //
analyzed: khrel yod cing bslab pa la gnan pa'o zhes pa ni bslab pa la gnan to cog la khrel yod pa dang / bslab pa la gnan ba las bskos shig pa'o //
translated: He is conscientious and he is firm in the precepts. He is conscientious about everything he does in the precepts, and he is firm in the precepts.

original: 'dul ba la shin tu nges pa dang zhal che lo drung la mkhas rab bo zhes pa ni 'dul ba'i lci yang dang ltung ba mi ltung ba'i dmigs phyed pa dang / zhal che'i tshul la mkhas pa las skos shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba la shin tu nges pa dang zhal che lo drung la mkhas rab bo zhes pa ni 'dul ba'i lci yang dang ltung ba mi ltung ba'i dmigs phyed pa dang / zhal che'i tshul la mkhas pa las skos shig pa'o //
translated: He is very precise about the Vinaya and he is skilled in legal procedures. He is precise about the Vinaya’s heavy and light and downfalls and non-downfalls, and he is skilled in the procedures of legal procedures.

original: bye zhig can no zhes pa ni des dbyangs shing rmel ba las phyis gzhan gyis kyang skyed phyin par mi nus pa'o //
analyzed: bye zhig can no zhes pa ni des dbyangs shing rmel ba las phyis gzhan gyis kyang skyed phyin par mi nus pa'o //
translated: He is a good arbitrator. He is an arbitrator who, having made a decision, cannot be swayed by others.

original: brling ba'o zhes pa ni zung thub pa'o //🔽bsam bas rang par mi byed pa zhes pa ni khro zhing ro mthur gyi khar mi 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: brling ba'o zhes pa ni zung thub pa'o // bsam bas rang par mi byed pa zhes pa ni khro zhing ro mthur gyi khar mi 'dor ba'o //
translated: He is patient. He is tolerant.🔽He does not act out of anger. He does not act out of anger and hatred.

original: snyoms pa zhes pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms pa zhes pa ni 'dod pa la sogs pas 'gro ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: He is impartial. He is not partial to those who like him and so on.

original: 'go ba'o zhes pa dang / dbyang ba'o zhes pa ni rtsod pa dang / lan 'go ba dang dbyangs nas slar shad kyis dbyang ba'o //
analyzed: 'go ba'o zhes pa dang / dbyang ba'o zhes pa ni rtsod pa dang / lan 'go ba dang dbyangs nas slar shad kyis dbyang ba'o //
translated: The words to begin and to continue refer to the dispute. The beginning and continuation of the dispute is the beginning and continuation of the explanation.

original: mdzangs pa zhes pa ni 'og ba mi rmongs pa mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: mdzangs pa zhes pa ni 'og ba mi rmongs pa mkhas pa'o //
translated: Wise means not confused, but skilled.

original: bdag gis ma phebs na dge 'dun la dbul zhes pa ni skam la gnas pa gong ma lta bus zhi bar ma nus na dge 'dun la phul cig pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ma phebs na dge 'dun la dbul zhes pa ni skam la gnas pa gong ma lta bus zhi bar ma nus na dge 'dun la phul cig pa'o //
translated: If I cannot settle it, I will give it to the Saṅgha means that if one cannot settle it as above, one should give it to the Saṅgha.

original: de dag ma nus na gzu bo bsko zhes pa ni dge @247b 'dun gyis kyang bsdum par ma nus na de dag chos pa'i gzu bo chang khyur len pa dmigs kyis skos shig pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ma nus na gzu bo bsko zhes pa ni dge @247b 'dun gyis kyang bsdum par ma nus na de dag chos pa'i gzu bo chang khyur len pa dmigs kyis skos shig pa'o //
translated: If one cannot do that, one should appoint an arbitrator means that if the Saṅgha also cannot settle it, one should appoint an arbitrator who is a righteous person.

original: dge 'dun du langs pa las mi bsnyung zhes pa ni gong ma ltar bsgo ba'ang bzhi man chad las ma bsnyung shig pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun du langs pa las mi bsnyung zhes pa ni gong ma ltar bsgo ba'ang bzhi man chad las ma bsnyung shig pa'o //
translated: Do not make it a dispute of the Saṅgha means that one should not make it a dispute of four or more.

original: gzu bo de dag nyid kyis ma chems na snod bsgo zhes pa ni gzu bo snga mas mi nus na snod cig pa'o //
analyzed: gzu bo de dag nyid kyis ma chems na snod bsgo zhes pa ni gzu bo snga mas mi nus na snod cig pa'o //
translated: If those arbitrators cannot decide, one should appoint a vessel means that if the previous arbitrators cannot do it, one should appoint a vessel.

translated: You who are in the retinue, you who have life, having gone forth in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, you who fight, who pick quarrels, who are hostile and dispute, you have not found what is to be found, you have found fault, you have not found what is good.

original: tshe dang ldan pa mtshang ma 'dru ma 'khon ma rtsod cig gnyis 'thab pa dang / gcig 'pham gcig rgyal gyi gnyis rgyal mi srid do //

translated: You who have life, do not pick quarrels, do not be hostile, do not dispute. When two fight, one is defeated, the other victorious, but victory for both is impossible.

original: gnyis bang 'gyed dang / gnyis mi rgyal gyi gcig rgyal la gcig 'pham mo zhes so zhes pa ni gnas brtan des gong ma ltar thibs kyis gnan pa dang ; de dag 'khor na tshig 'di skad du thar ngag skyed cig pa'o //

translated: You should not take the non-Dharma-determining vote means you should not take the non-Dharma-determining vote.

original: mdo dang 'dul ba dang mdo sde 'dzin pa la ma dris par ma yin zhes pa dang / dbye bar dga' ba ma yin zhes pa dang / chos ma yin pas ma yin zhes pa ni mdo sde 'dzin pa la sogs pa snga nas ma dris pa dang /
analyzed: mdo dang 'dul ba dang mdo sde 'dzin pa la ma dris par ma yin zhes pa dang / dbye bar dga' ba ma yin zhes pa dang / chos ma yin pas ma yin zhes pa ni mdo sde 'dzin pa la sogs pa snga nas ma dris pa dang /
translated: You should not take it without asking the Vinaya-holders, Sūtra-holders, and Abhidharma-holders, You should not take it with the intention of causing a schism, and You should not take it with non-Dharma means you should not take it without first asking the Sūtra-holders and so forth.

original: bye yang bla ba dang / chos ma yin par bsams te tshul shing len par ma byed cig pa'o //
analyzed: bye yang bla ba dang / chos ma yin par bsams te tshul shing len par ma byed cig pa'o //
translated: Do not take the voting ticket, thinking that it is not the Dharma.

original: 'di dag tu 'gyur ba shes na'ang ma yin zhes pa ni de'i mod la ni ma yin gyi phyis chos ma yin pa dang / dge 'dun dbye bar 'ong ba lta na 'ang ma len cig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag tu 'gyur ba shes na'ang ma yin zhes pa ni de'i mod la ni ma yin gyi phyis chos ma yin pa dang / dge 'dun dbye bar 'ong ba lta na 'ang ma len cig pa'o //
translated: Even if you know that it will turn out like this, do not take it, thinking that it will not be so immediately, but that later it will lead to non-Dharma and a schism in the Sangha.

original: mnyam na nyan thos chen po'i phyir tshul shing gcig blang zhes pa ni mnyam pa zhig tu gyur na nyan thos chen po'i tshul shing gcig chos yin pa'i phyogs kyi khar snon cig pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam na nyan thos chen po'i phyir tshul shing gcig blang zhes pa ni mnyam pa zhig tu gyur na nyan thos chen po'i tshul shing gcig chos yin pa'i phyogs kyi khar snon cig pa'o //
translated: If it is a tie, take one more voting ticket for the sake of the great Sravakas. If it is a tie, add one more voting ticket for the sake of the great Sravakas to the side that is for the Dharma.

original: chos ma yin pas de ltar zhi na'ang mi bskyar zhes pa ni mdor na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su byin pas zhi bar gyur na'ang de bzhin du gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pas de ltar zhi na'ang mi bskyar zhes pa ni mdor na chos ma yin pa'i phyogs su byin pas zhi bar gyur na'ang de bzhin du gyis shig pa'o //
translated: If it is pacified in that way by the non-Dharma, do not repeat it. In short, if it is pacified by giving to the side of non-Dharma, do it that way.

original: mi 'dum bar rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga ni de ltar bstan nas /
analyzed: mi 'dum bar rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i cho ga ni de ltar bstan nas /
translated: The ritual for pacifying a dispute that does not reconcile has been taught like this.

original: gong du lung mi ster ba rtsod pa ni 'di dang gsang bas so zhes smos pa la rnam pa gcig gis gong du bstan pa yin gsang ba ston pa ni ma nyes par glengs na gtsang zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: gong du lung mi ster ba rtsod pa ni 'di dang gsang bas so zhes smos pa la rnam pa gcig gis gong du bstan pa yin gsang ba ston pa ni ma nyes par glengs na gtsang zhes pa yin te /
translated: One aspect is taught above. Teaching the secret is that if one is accused without fault, one is said to be pure.

original: ma nyes pa la glengs na dran pa dang ma rmongs pas song shig pa'o //
analyzed: ma nyes pa la glengs na dran pa dang ma rmongs pas song shig pa'o //
translated: If one is accused without fault, one is dismissed because of mindfulness and non-delusion.

original: ma nyes par glengs pa de la rnam pa du yod ce na gleng ba de ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: ma nyes par glengs pa de la rnam pa du yod ce na gleng ba de ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: If that accusation without fault is of how many types? That accusation is of four types.

original: dngos po med pa dang / nor ba'i dbang dang / bcos pa la ma ltos pa dang / smos pas byas pa rnams so zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dang / nor ba'i dbang dang / bcos pa la ma ltos pa dang / smos pas byas pa rnams so zhes pa yin te /
translated: It is said to be that which is done by the power of error, that which is done by the power of fabrication, and that which is done by the power of mention.

original: rnam pa 'di bzhi lta bus glengs na ma nyes pa la glengs pa zhes @249b bya'o //
analyzed: rnam pa 'di bzhi lta bus glengs na ma nyes pa la glengs pa zhes @249b bya'o //
translated: If one is accused by these four types, it is said to be an accusation without fault.

original: de la dngos po med ces pa ni nyes pa'i dmigs ye med pa'o //
analyzed: de la dngos po med ces pa ni nyes pa'i dmigs ye med pa'o //
translated: Among them, that which is said to be non-existent is the complete absence of the basis of the fault.

original: nor ba'i dbang zhes pa ni lhag ma byas pa la ltung ba byas so zhes zer ba lta bur brgal ba nor ba'o //
analyzed: nor ba'i dbang zhes pa ni lhag ma byas pa la ltung ba byas so zhes zer ba lta bur brgal ba nor ba'o //
translated: That which is said to be done by the power of error is, for example, like accusing one who has committed a residual offense of having committed a downfall.

original: bcos pa ma ltos zhes pa ni nyes pa'i gnyen po byas zin pa'i 'og tu gleng zhing rgol ba'o //
analyzed: bcos pa ma ltos zhes pa ni nyes pa'i gnyen po byas zin pa'i 'og tu gleng zhing rgol ba'o //
translated: Not depending on a correction means to bring up and argue about something after the antidote to a fault has already been applied.

original: smos pas byas zhes pa ni smos te ma dran pa'i tshe nyes byas pa'o //
analyzed: smos pas byas zhes pa ni smos te ma dran pa'i tshe nyes byas pa'o //
translated: Done by mentioning means to say I did a wrong when it is mentioned but not remembered.

original: de bzhi lta bus brgal na gtsang ba'i thabs ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhi lta bus brgal na gtsang ba'i thabs ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: If one argues in these four ways, how does one purify oneself?

original: dngos po gsum ni dran pa'i 'dul ba byin pas shes pa dang tha ma ni ma rmongs pa'i 'dul ba byin pas zhes pa yin te /🔽dngos po med pa dang nor pa dang bcos ba la ma ltos pa nyes pa gsum ni nyes par mi dran zhe'am nyes byas su mi dran zhes zer na de skad du zer ba dang sbyar te gtsang ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po gsum ni dran pa'i 'dul ba byin pas shes pa dang tha ma ni ma rmongs pa'i 'dul ba byin pas zhes pa yin te / dngos po med pa dang nor pa dang bcos ba la ma ltos pa nyes pa gsum ni nyes par mi dran zhe'am nyes byas su mi dran zhes zer na de skad du zer ba dang sbyar te gtsang ba'o //
translated: The three things are: I know because I was disciplined by being reminded, and I was disciplined by being unconfused about the last one.🔽If one says, I do not remember the three faults, or I do not remember the wrong I did, one should apply those words and purify oneself.

original: smos pas byas pa ni ma smos shing dran pa'i tshe nyes byas su mi dran pa'o zhes zer na de'i khar bor la gtsang ba'o //
analyzed: smos pas byas pa ni ma smos shing dran pa'i tshe nyes byas su mi dran pa'o zhes zer na de'i khar bor la gtsang ba'o //
translated: If one says, I do not remember the wrong I did when it was mentioned, one should add that and purify oneself.

original: ltung ba'i rtsod pa ston pa ni nyes pa can gyis 'khrug pa ni gsum ste /
analyzed: ltung ba'i rtsod pa ston pa ni nyes pa can gyis 'khrug pa ni gsum ste /
translated: The teaching on the dispute about downfalls is: The one with a fault has three disputes.

original: sa med pa dang gcugs yod pa la gnyis te /
analyzed: sa med pa dang gcugs yod pa la gnyis te /
translated: The one without a basis and the one with a basis are two.

original: phyogs gcig pa dang / dge 'dun thams cad pa'o zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: phyogs gcig pa dang / dge 'dun thams cad pa'o zhes pa yin te /
translated: The one with a faction and the one with the whole saṅgha.

original: ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gsum ni ltung ba'i rtsod pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: ming gis smos pa 'di rnams gsum ni ltung ba'i rtsod pa yin pa'o //
translated: These three mentioned by name are disputes about downfalls.

original: de la bcugs zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de la bcugs zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is a dispute?

original: phyogs phyogs su chad pa'o zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: phyogs phyogs su chad pa'o zhes pa yin te /
translated: It is a division into factions.

original: dge 'dun ser sder chad pa gcugs pa yin pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun ser sder chad pa gcugs pa yin pa'o //
translated: The saṅgha is divided into factions of the Mahīśāsaka.

original: de dag gi gnyen po ston pa ni dngos po ni khas blangs ba gnyen po'o zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi gnyen po ston pa ni dngos po ni khas blangs ba gnyen po'o zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The teaching on their antidotes is: The antidote is the acceptance of the fact.

original: de la gcugs med pa ni bdag gis nyes so zhes khas blangs pa gnyen por 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de la gcugs med pa ni bdag gis nyes so zhes khas blangs pa gnyen por 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The antidote is the acceptance that “I have a fault.”

original: gnyis pa ni mngon sum gyis 'dul ba'o zhes pa ni phyogs gcig gi gcugs su 'gyur ba'i nyes pa ni gleng ba dang bcas te dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar bkug cing smra zhing sbyangs pas 'dum ba yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni mngon sum gyis 'dul ba'o zhes pa ni phyogs gcig gi gcugs su 'gyur ba'i nyes pa ni gleng ba dang bcas te dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar bkug cing smra zhing sbyangs pas 'dum ba yin no //
translated: The second is to be reconciled by the method of direct confrontation.

original: gsum pa ni rtsva bting ba'o zhes pa ni dge 'dun thams cad kyi gcugs su 'gyur ba'i nyes pa ni rtsva bsnyil ba dang 'dra bar nang 'dum ba gnyen por 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ni rtsva bting ba'o zhes pa ni dge 'dun thams cad kyi gcugs su 'gyur ba'i nyes pa ni rtsva bsnyil ba dang 'dra bar nang 'dum ba gnyen por 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The third is to be reconciled by the method of the spread of grass.

original: de nang 'dum pa'i tshe nyes pa bshags pa'i thabs ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nang 'dum pa'i tshe nyes pa bshags pa'i thabs ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: When one is reconciled, how does one confess the fault?

original: mang po'i don du ni gcig gis dge 'dun ma yin pa la bshags pa'i gnyen po bya zhes pa yin te /🔽gang la nyes pa yod pa'i @250a * //
analyzed: mang po'i don du ni gcig gis dge 'dun ma yin pa la bshags pa'i gnyen po bya zhes pa yin te / gang la nyes pa yod pa'i @250a * //
translated: For the sake of many, one should confess to a person who is not a member of the Sangha.

original: phyogs kyi nang nas gcig cig gis thams cad kyi don du dge 'dun la bshags pa ma yin pa'i gang zag la bshags pa rnams bshag par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi nang nas gcig cig gis thams cad kyi don du dge 'dun la bshags pa ma yin pa'i gang zag la bshags pa rnams bshag par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: One person from among those who have the fault should confess for the sake of all to a person who is not a member of the Sangha.

original: du ma ni cig car du'o zhes pa ni nyes pa'i sna grangs du ma yod pa yang de lta bu'i tshe cig car du bshags shig pa'o //
analyzed: du ma ni cig car du'o zhes pa ni nyes pa'i sna grangs du ma yod pa yang de lta bu'i tshe cig car du bshags shig pa'o //
translated: The phrase many are simultaneous means that the many varieties of faults should be confessed in that way, simultaneously.🔽In what way should they be confessed simultaneously?🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.

original: cig car du bshags pa'i snyad ji skad du bya zhe na /
analyzed: cig car du bshags pa'i snyad ji skad du bya zhe na /
translated: It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.

original: gang nyes pa smos pa dang shes par bya bas so zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: gang nyes pa smos pa dang shes par bya bas so zhes pa yin te /
translated: It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.

original: gang gang yin pa dang gang zag su sus nyes pa rnams smos shing pha rol gyis go bar gyis shig pa'o //🔽de dag ltar bya ba gang gi tshe zhe na /
analyzed: gang gang yin pa dang gang zag su sus nyes pa rnams smos shing pha rol gyis go bar gyis shig pa'o // de dag ltar bya ba gang gi tshe zhe na /
translated: It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.

original: phyogs tha dad pa du ma na'o zhes pa yin te /🔽phyogs so sor chad pa rnams 'dum na gdod de ltar gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs tha dad pa du ma na'o zhes pa yin te / phyogs so sor chad pa rnams 'dum na gdod de ltar gyis shig pa'o //
translated: It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.

original: khas ma blangs pa dang gyi na pa ni bshags par mi 'gyur zhes pa ni nyes pa yod par khas blangs pa dang / nyes med par khas blangs te gyi nar bshags pa ni bshags par mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: khas ma blangs pa dang gyi na pa ni bshags par mi 'gyur zhes pa ni nyes pa yod par khas blangs pa dang / nyes med par khas blangs te gyi nar bshags pa ni bshags par mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.🔽 It is said, by mentioning and by understanding.

original: cig car du gleng du rung zhes pa ni nyes pa du ma 'ang gang zag du mal gleng ba cig car du byar rung ba'o //
analyzed: cig car du gleng du rung zhes pa ni nyes pa du ma 'ang gang zag du mal gleng ba cig car du byar rung ba'o //
translated: The phrase it is proper to speak simultaneously means that it is proper to speak simultaneously to many persons.

original: gleng ba yang de bzhin zhes pa ni gang zag gcig la gleng ba pa du mas gleng du'ang rung ba'o //
analyzed: gleng ba yang de bzhin zhes pa ni gang zag gcig la gleng ba pa du mas gleng du'ang rung ba'o //
translated: The phrase the speaking is also like that means that it is proper for many speakers to speak to one person.

original: de ltar rung ba'i grangs su ma chad kyi zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar rung ba'i grangs su ma chad kyi zhe na /
translated: If one asks, Is there a limit to the number of persons to whom it is proper to speak?

original: 'dir 'di'i grangs chad pa med ces pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'di'i grangs chad pa med ces pa yin te /
translated: The phrase there is no limit to the number of persons here is the answer.

original: dus gleng du'ang rung ste grangs chad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: dus gleng du'ang rung ste grangs chad pa med pa'o //
translated: The phrase it is proper to speak at any time means that there is no limit to the time.

original: lus dang ngag tu bsdams pa dang sde snod rnams shes pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbus su snying nas chos dang 'dul ba dang de las log pa rnams log par mi sgrog pa gsum dang ldan pa'i gleng ba pa ni brtsan par bya zhes pa ni rnam pa 'di gsum lta bu'i gleng ba'i brtsan par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang ngag tu bsdams pa dang sde snod rnams shes pa dang / dge 'dun gyi dbus su snying nas chos dang 'dul ba dang de las log pa rnams log par mi sgrog pa gsum dang ldan pa'i gleng ba pa ni brtsan par bya zhes pa ni rnam pa 'di gsum lta bu'i gleng ba'i brtsan par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The phrase the speaker should be respected means that the speaker should be respected if he has three qualities: he is restrained in body and speech, he knows the scriptures, and he does not, from the heart, proclaim what is contrary to the Dharma and Vinaya in the midst of the community.

original: de pa chos shes la ni dngos po'i don to //
analyzed: de pa chos shes la ni dngos po'i don to //
translated: The phrase he knows the Dharma means that he knows the meaning of the text.

original: 'dul ba shes pa ni spyad pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba shes pa ni spyad pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: Knowledge of the Vinaya is the procedure of practice.

original: tshul khrims nyams pa dang log par sgrogs pa ni gcad zhes pa ni tshul khrims nyams pa dang log par smra bas glengs nas dge 'dun gyis mnyan par 'phral du chod cig pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims nyams pa dang log par sgrogs pa ni gcad zhes pa ni tshul khrims nyams pa dang log par smra bas glengs nas dge 'dun gyis mnyan par 'phral du chod cig pa'o //
translated: When there is a violation of morality or false accusation, cut off means that when there is a violation of morality or a false accusation, the Saṅgha should immediately cut off listening.

original: 'di lta bu ma yin zhing sde snod 'dzin la mi shes pa ni shad kyis sbyang zhes pa ni lus dang ngag bsdams pa yang ma yin la log par sgrogs pa'ang ma yin pa dang sde snod ni 'dzin la de'i don mi shes pas glengs na ni ma
analyzed: 'di lta bu ma yin zhing sde snod 'dzin la mi shes pa ni shad kyis sbyang zhes pa ni lus dang ngag bsdams pa yang ma yin la log par sgrogs pa'ang ma yin pa dang sde snod ni 'dzin la de'i don mi shes pas glengs na ni ma
translated: If it is not like this, and the Tripiṭaka holder does not know, thoroughly investigate, means that if there is an accusation by one who is not restrained in body and speech, and not a false accuser, and a Tripiṭaka holder who does not know the meaning of that, then

original: nyes par shad kyis sbyongs shig pa'o //
analyzed: nyes par shad kyis sbyongs shig pa'o //
translated: thoroughly investigate the accusation.

original: rnam pa gsum @250b dang ldan pa'i glengs par brtsan par bya ba yang brtag mi dgos par de'i kha thabs su 'dor ram zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum @250b dang ldan pa'i glengs par brtsan par bya ba yang brtag mi dgos par de'i kha thabs su 'dor ram zhe na /
translated: If there is an accusation with the three aspects, it should not be investigated, and if it is not the method of that, should it be abandoned?

original: 'di'i bsam pa 'ang brtag par mi bya zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di'i bsam pa 'ang brtag par mi bya zhes pa yin te /
translated: The intention of this should also not be investigated, means

original: de gsum dang ldan pas rgol du zin kyang brgal ba dmigs su phebs sam ma phebs pa ni rtogs shig pa'o //
analyzed: de gsum dang ldan pas rgol du zin kyang brgal ba dmigs su phebs sam ma phebs pa ni rtogs shig pa'o //
translated: If one has these three, one should understand whether the opponent has arrived at the point of the refutation or not.

original: jis brtag ce na dmigs su ma phebs pa'o zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: jis brtag ce na dmigs su ma phebs pa'o zhes pa yin te /
translated: By what is it investigated? By the non-arrival at the point.

original: des glengs pa'ang dmigs su phebs na brgal du zin kyang ma brtsan pa'o //
analyzed: des glengs pa'ang dmigs su phebs na brgal du zin kyang ma brtsan pa'o //
translated: If the opponent has arrived at the point of the refutation, then even though the refutation has been made, it is not to be considered.

original: de la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the point?

original: yul dus spyod lam byas pa ni dmigs so zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: yul dus spyod lam byas pa ni dmigs so zhes pa yin te /
translated: The point is the place, the time, the behavior, and the action.

original: 'di rnams kyi dmigs su phebs na ni dmigs su phebs pa yin pa'o//
analyzed: 'di rnams kyi dmigs su phebs na ni dmigs su phebs pa yin pa'o//
translated: If these are arrived at, then the point has been arrived at.

original: de la yul zhes pa ni lkog yin nam ma yin pa dang lam ka yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de la yul zhes pa ni lkog yin nam ma yin pa dang lam ka yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: The place is whether it is hidden or not, or whether it is on the road.

original: dus shes pa ni nyin par ram mtshan mo lta bu'o //
analyzed: dus shes pa ni nyin par ram mtshan mo lta bu'o //
translated: The time is whether it is day or night.

original: spyod lam shes pa ni 'greng ngam 'dug pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: spyod lam shes pa ni 'greng ngam 'dug pa lta bu'o //
translated: The behavior is whether one is standing or sitting.

original: byas zhes pa ni pham pa'am lhag ma la sogs pa byas pa'o //
analyzed: byas zhes pa ni pham pa'am lhag ma la sogs pa byas pa'o //
translated: The action is whether one has committed a defeating offense or a partially defeating offense, and so on.

original: thod rgal dang rngan sdang gis gleng ba ni mi skye zhes pa ni ched ci zer ba lta bur tshig 'khrul pa dang khon yod pa'i phyir gleng ba ni gleng bar mi tshud de mi brtsan pa'o //
analyzed: thod rgal dang rngan sdang gis gleng ba ni mi skye zhes pa ni ched ci zer ba lta bur tshig 'khrul pa dang khon yod pa'i phyir gleng ba ni gleng bar mi tshud de mi brtsan pa'o //
translated: The one who says I do not accept is confused in speech and has a fault, like one who says I do not accept what I accept. Therefore, the one who says I do not accept is not included in the discussion and is not to be respected.

original: glengs te khas blangs na zin pa'o zhes pa ni glengs pa dang nyes pa yod pa bden no zhes khas blangs pa ni gleng ba'i mtha' 'am gleng ba'i mjug nyid de yin pa'o //
analyzed: glengs te khas blangs na zin pa'o zhes pa ni glengs pa dang nyes pa yod pa bden no zhes khas blangs pa ni gleng ba'i mtha' 'am gleng ba'i mjug nyid de yin pa'o //
translated: If one accepts the discussion, it is concluded. This means that if one accepts, It is true that there is a discussion and a fault, that is the end of the discussion or the conclusion of the discussion.

original: bden pa mthong ba dang yon tan gyi khyad zhugs pa gang yang rung bas smra ba ni khyim pa zhig na'ang tshad mar bya zhes pa gleng ba dus dang dngos po gnyis la bden pa'am mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i khyad yod dam /
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba dang yon tan gyi khyad zhugs pa gang yang rung bas smra ba ni khyim pa zhig na'ang tshad mar bya zhes pa gleng ba dus dang dngos po gnyis la bden pa'am mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i khyad yod dam /
translated: If one speaks with the distinction of seeing the truth or having good qualities, even if one is a layperson, one should be taken as authoritative. This means that in a discussion, there is a difference between truth or seeing and not seeing, or between the two times.

original: yon tan che chung gis zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi 'bad ba ma yin zhes pa ni rtsod par gyur te /
analyzed: yon tan che chung gis zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi 'bad ba ma yin zhes pa ni rtsod par gyur te /
translated: It is not that one does not strive to pacify through the difference of great or small good qualities. This means that one has become contentious.

original: cho ga la gcugs pa'i nan ma chung shig / rtsod pa'i dngos po'o /
analyzed: cho ga la gcugs pa'i nan ma chung shig / rtsod pa'i dngos po'o /
translated: Do not be too attached to the ritual.🔽This is the basis of dispute.

original: // / rtsod pa'i dngos po zhus pa las 'byung ba bsdus te ston pa ni bya bas rtsod pa ni zhi'o cog 'du zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: // / rtsod pa'i dngos po zhus pa las 'byung ba bsdus te ston pa ni bya bas rtsod pa ni zhi'o cog 'du zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The summary of the questions on the basis of dispute is as follows: The dispute over actions is settled by the assembly.

original: bya ba rtsod ces bya ba ni 'dur mi btub pa'i phyir rtsod pa yin te /
analyzed: bya ba rtsod ces bya ba ni 'dur mi btub pa'i phyir rtsod pa yin te /
translated: The dispute over actions is a dispute because it cannot be settled.

original: mi mthun pas rtsod pa'i phyir yang 'du dgos spang ba la rtsod pa'i phyir yang 'du nyes pa can gyi phyir yang 'du dgos pas na bya ba la sogs pa ni zhi ba'o cog 'dul bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pas rtsod pa'i phyir yang 'du dgos spang ba la rtsod pa'i phyir yang 'du nyes pa can gyi phyir yang 'du dgos pas na bya ba la sogs pa ni zhi ba'o cog 'dul bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Since it is a dispute due to disagreement, it must be settled by the assembly. Since it is a dispute due to a fault, it must be settled by the assembly. Therefore, actions and so on are settled by the assembly.

original: bskang bar mi 'os pa ni dge @251a * //
analyzed: bskang bar mi 'os pa ni dge @251a * //
translated: That which is not suitable to be settled is the dispute over the Saṅgha's actions.

original: 'dun gyi bya ba la gzu bor ma yin zhes pa ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang zhig pa la sogs pa la bskang bar mi 'os pa ni gzu bor yang mi chud pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun gyi bya ba la gzu bor ma yin zhes pa ni bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang zhig pa la sogs pa la bskang bar mi 'os pa ni gzu bor yang mi chud pa'o //
translated: The line not being straightforward in the Saṅgha's actions means that that which is not suitable to be settled, such as in the case of one who has not completed the novitiate or one who has died, is not even considered to be straightforward.

original: 'og ma rnams ni bsnyen par rdzogs pas dbang bya'o zhes pa dang / bud med kyi la yang skyes pa dbang ngo zhes pa ni dge tshul la sogs pa chad pas gcod pa'i dbang bsnyen par rdzogs pas bya ba dang / dge slong ma chad pas gcad pa'i dbang dge slong gis gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'og ma rnams ni bsnyen par rdzogs pas dbang bya'o zhes pa dang / bud med kyi la yang skyes pa dbang ngo zhes pa ni dge tshul la sogs pa chad pas gcod pa'i dbang bsnyen par rdzogs pas bya ba dang / dge slong ma chad pas gcad pa'i dbang dge slong gis gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The statement that women are controlled by men means that full ordination controls the cutting off of the vows of novices and so on and that monks control the cutting off of the vows of nuns.

original: 'tsho ba'am bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyams na zhi bar 'gyur bar shes pa ni shi ba'am babs na rtsod pa'ang 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: 'tsho ba'am bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyams na zhi bar 'gyur bar shes pa ni shi ba'am babs na rtsod pa'ang 'jig pa'o //
translated: If one knows that disputes will be pacified by death or by the lapse of livelihood or full ordination, then death or the lapse of livelihood or full ordination will destroy the dispute.

original: sbang bar 'gyur ba dang / phyogs gzhan yan chad kyang zhes pa ni spang bar gyur pa dang / phyogs gzhan du gyur pa yan chad kyis kyang rtsod pa rang 'jig par ston pa'o //
analyzed: sbang bar 'gyur ba dang / phyogs gzhan yan chad kyang zhes pa ni spang bar gyur pa dang / phyogs gzhan du gyur pa yan chad kyis kyang rtsod pa rang 'jig par ston pa'o //
translated: If one knows that disputes will be pacified by the lapse of the rainy season retreat or by the lapse of the region, then the lapse of the rainy season retreat or the lapse of the region will destroy the dispute.

original: gung du song ba dang nad yun rings kyis thebs na yang zhes pa ni sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gung du song ba dang nad yun rings kyis thebs na yang zhes pa ni sogs pa yin te /
translated: If one knows that disputes will be pacified by going to the center or by long term illness, then going to the center or long term illness will destroy the dispute.

original: mi longs pa'ang kungs so'i zhes pa ni gong ma ltar gud du song ba'am nad kyis thebs pa la sogs pa brgal ba 'am rgol ba gang yang rung ba cig de ltar gyur na rtsod pa rang 'jig go //
analyzed: mi longs pa'ang kungs so'i zhes pa ni gong ma ltar gud du song ba'am nad kyis thebs pa la sogs pa brgal ba 'am rgol ba gang yang rung ba cig de ltar gyur na rtsod pa rang 'jig go //
translated: Also, not bowing is included in the above, that is, if one who has gone elsewhere, or who has been struck by illness, and so on, is not able to bow, or if one who is able to bow is not able to do so, then the dispute is self-destroyed.

original: rtsod pa'i dngos po zhus pa'o /
analyzed: rtsod pa'i dngos po zhus pa'o /
translated: The topic of dispute is finished.

original: // / gnas kyi dngos po ston pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa bas mchog pa la rab tu byung bas phyag bya zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: // / gnas kyi dngos po ston pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa bas mchog pa la rab tu byung bas phyag bya zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
translated: The topic of the basis is taught by “one who has gone forth in the vows of individual liberation should bow to the preceptor,” and so on.

original: mtshungs na rgan pa la'o zhes pa dang mtshan gzhan pa la ma yin zhes pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa mtshungs kyang gang rgan rabs la phyag bya ba dang mtshan tha dang pa ste bud med la ni ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshungs na rgan pa la'o zhes pa dang mtshan gzhan pa la ma yin zhes pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa mtshungs kyang gang rgan rabs la phyag bya ba dang mtshan tha dang pa ste bud med la ni ma yin pa'o //
translated: “If equal, to the elder” and “not to one with a different name” means that even if the vows of individual liberation are equal, one should bow to the elder, but not to a woman, even if her name is the same.

original: skyes pa mi dma' ba la bud med kyis zhes pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa las mi dma' ba'i dge slong gsar bu zhig yin na yang dge slong ma yis phyag gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: skyes pa mi dma' ba la bud med kyis zhes pa ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa las mi dma' ba'i dge slong gsar bu zhig yin na yang dge slong ma yis phyag gyis shig pa'o //
translated: A woman should not bow down to a man who is not a monk, but if he is a newly ordained monk who is not inferior to her in the pratimoksha vows, she should bow down to him.

original: sa gzhan la gnas pa zhig pa dge slong mas bslus pa chos ma yin pa'i phyogs du mar gnas pa mtshams med pa byas pa nyal ba mnyam par gzhag pa 'brel pa yengs pa rgyab kyis lta ba grong na gnas pa /
analyzed: sa gzhan la gnas pa zhig pa dge slong mas bslus pa chos ma yin pa'i phyogs du mar gnas pa mtshams med pa byas pa nyal ba mnyam par gzhag pa 'brel pa yengs pa rgyab kyis lta ba grong na gnas pa /
translated: A nun should not bow down to a monk who is on a different level, who is fallen, who is deceived by a nun, who is in many non-dharma positions, who has committed a heinous act, who is lying down, who is in equipoise, who is distracted, who is turned away, who lives in a town,

original: zas la bkad pa rnams ma gtogs zhes pa ni ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi gnas na 'dug pa ni phyag bya ba la ma gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: zas la bkad pa rnams ma gtogs zhes pa ni ming gis smos pa 'di rnams kyi gnas na 'dug pa ni phyag bya ba la ma gtogs pa'o //
translated: or who is eating. These are the exceptions to the rule of bowing down to those mentioned by name.

original: rab tu byung ba la khyim pas zhes pa ni rab tu byung ba la ni khyim pa'o cog gis phyag gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba la khyim pas zhes pa ni rab tu byung ba la ni khyim pa'o cog gis phyag gyis shig pa'o //
translated: A layperson should not bow down to a renunciate, but a layperson should bow down to a renunciate.

original: sangs rgyas la ni thams cad kyis so zhes pa ni sangs rgyas la ni thams cad kyis phyag gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la ni thams cad kyis so zhes pa ni sangs rgyas la ni thams cad kyis phyag gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Everyone should bow down to the Buddha. Everyone should bow down to the Buddha.

original: phyag @251b bya ba dang / mi bya ba rnams de ltar bstan nas gtsug lag khang gi yan lag du bya ba'o cog ston pa ni gtsug lag khang bya zhes pa dang / ngos gcig gi dbus su dri gtsang khang bya zhes pa dang / de'i thad kar sgo khang zhes pa dang /🔽gru bzhi ni dge zhes pa ni gtsug lag khang gru bzhir byas pa ngos gcig gi dbus su dri gtsang khang rtsig cing de dang byang stad kyi mdun du sgo khang gyis shig pa'o //🔽ngos gsum pa yang zhes pa ni gtsug lag khang gru bzhir 'dug pa la ngos gsum ni dri gtsang khang dang gnas khang byas la /
analyzed: phyag @251b bya ba dang / mi bya ba rnams de ltar bstan nas gtsug lag khang gi yan lag du bya ba'o cog ston pa ni gtsug lag khang bya zhes pa dang / ngos gcig gi dbus su dri gtsang khang bya zhes pa dang / de'i thad kar sgo khang zhes pa dang / gru bzhi ni dge zhes pa ni gtsug lag khang gru bzhir byas pa ngos gcig gi dbus su dri gtsang khang rtsig cing de dang byang stad kyi mdun du sgo khang gyis shig pa'o // ngos gsum pa yang zhes pa ni gtsug lag khang gru bzhir 'dug pa la ngos gsum ni dri gtsang khang dang gnas khang byas la /
translated: Having taught what should and should not be done, the following teaches all that should be done as a part of the temple:

original: che bzhis phye na'o zhes pa ni phye ba'ang brtsan par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: che bzhis phye na'o zhes pa ni phye ba'ang brtsan par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: If you divide it into four great ones, this means you should also consider the divisions.

original: the tshom pa des pa ma yin zhes pa ni nyes sam ma nyes su ma nges te /
analyzed: the tshom pa des pa ma yin zhes pa ni nyes sam ma nyes su ma nges te /
translated: The doubtful one is not certain, this means it is not certain whether it is a fault or not.

original: the tshom yod bzhin pa ni nges pa zhes pa nyid ma yin pas brgal kyang mi brtsan pa ste dngos su ni ka ra'i chu la skyo mar nor blta bu'o //
analyzed: the tshom yod bzhin pa ni nges pa zhes pa nyid ma yin pas brgal kyang mi brtsan pa ste dngos su ni ka ra'i chu la skyo mar nor blta bu'o //
translated: While having doubt, it is not certain, so even if you argue, it is not to be considered. In reality, it is like mistaking sour gruel for water in a pot.

original: 'di ni khas blangs pa bzhin du nges pa'o zhes pa ni dben pa mthong bas phye ba ni khas blangs pa bzhin du gtsigs che ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ni khas blangs pa bzhin du nges pa'o zhes pa ni dben pa mthong bas phye ba ni khas blangs pa bzhin du gtsigs che ba'o //
translated: This is certainty according to what was accepted, this means the division by seeing emptiness is to be highly regarded according to what was accepted.

original: khas mi len pa ni bsnyon pa'o zhes pa ni sngar nyes pa yod pa khas blangs pa phyis bsnyon pa ni sngar khas blangs pa de mi brtsan par ston pa'o //
analyzed: khas mi len pa ni bsnyon pa'o zhes pa ni sngar nyes pa yod pa khas blangs pa phyis bsnyon pa ni sngar khas blangs pa de mi brtsan par ston pa'o //
translated: Not accepting is denying, this means previously having accepted the existence of faults, later denying is showing that the previous acceptance is not to be considered.

original: de lta bur bsnyon nges pa la thabs ji lta bur bya zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bur bsnyon nges pa la thabs ji lta bur bya zhe na /
translated: In that way, how is denial to be ascertained?

original: dge 'dun la khas len cing bsnyon pa ni rtog tu gzhug ces pa yin te /
analyzed: dge 'dun la khas len cing bsnyon pa ni rtog tu gzhug ces pa yin te /
translated: Accepting and denying to the Saṅgha is to be brought to an investigation, this means it is to be brought to an investigation.

original: 'di lta bu de sems su chug shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di lta bu de sems su chug shig pa'o //
translated: Understand that this is the mind.

original: de'i rang bzhin tshol ba la phan pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin tshol ba'o zhes pa ni de ltar gya gyu med pa de la phan pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin tshol ba zhes bya ba yong yang de'i phyir bstan pa yin par ston pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin tshol ba la phan pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin tshol ba'o zhes pa ni de ltar gya gyu med pa de la phan pa'i phyir de'i rang bzhin tshol ba zhes bya ba yong yang de'i phyir bstan pa yin par ston pa'o //
translated: In order to help search for its nature, it is called searching for its nature.🔽Some explain that this is done by the method of cutting off.

original: kha cig ni 'di la chad pa'i tshul gyis so zhes 'chad do zhes pa gong ma ltar dge 'dun la gya gyur byed pa ni dge 'dun thams cad 'dus pa la dge slong cig gis gsol bar bya ste /
analyzed: kha cig ni 'di la chad pa'i tshul gyis so zhes 'chad do zhes pa gong ma ltar dge 'dun la gya gyur byed pa ni dge 'dun thams cad 'dus pa la dge slong cig gis gsol bar bya ste /
translated: As above, one who acts deceitfully toward the saṅgha should request a monk to make a request to the entire assembled saṅgha.

original: las su bya ba ni btsun pa'i dge 'dun gson cig dge slong me bzhi sgyes 'di dge 'dun gyi dbus su khas len cing bsnyon pas na dge 'dun gyis 'dir rang bzhin tshol du gzhug go zhes 'byung gi me bzhi skyes rgan rabs la de'i rang bzhin btsal
analyzed: las su bya ba ni btsun pa'i dge 'dun gson cig dge slong me bzhi sgyes 'di dge 'dun gyi dbus su khas len cing bsnyon pas na dge 'dun gyis 'dir rang bzhin tshol du gzhug go zhes 'byung gi me bzhi skyes rgan rabs la de'i rang bzhin btsal
translated: The action is as follows: Venerable saṅgha, please listen. Since the monk Caitra has admitted and denied in the midst of the saṅgha, the saṅgha will make him search for his nature here.🔽Since it does not say that Caitra requests the elders to search for his nature,

original: bar gsol lo zhes mi 'byung bas na /
analyzed: bar gsol lo zhes mi 'byung bas na /
translated: it is not the case that he requests the elders.

original: de'i rang bzhin tshol @252a * //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin tshol @252a * //
translated: The nature of that is sought.🔽

original: du gzhug pa yang chad pa'i tshul yin no zhes slob dpon kha cig 'chad par ston pa'o //
analyzed: du gzhug pa yang chad pa'i tshul yin no zhes slob dpon kha cig 'chad par ston pa'o //
translated: Some masters explain that it is a nihilistic method to investigate the nature of the offense.🔽This is not good, because it contradicts the sūtras.🔽The above passage states:

original: de ni mdo dang 'gal ba'i phyir mi bzang zhes pa ni gong ma skad du bya ba yang kun dga' bo dge slong 'ga' zhig dge 'dun gyi dbus su khas len cing yang len kyang bsnyon par byed na dge slong de la tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis
analyzed: de ni mdo dang 'gal ba'i phyir mi bzang zhes pa ni gong ma skad du bya ba yang kun dga' bo dge slong 'ga' zhig dge 'dun gyi dbus su khas len cing yang len kyang bsnyon par byed na dge slong de la tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis
translated: If a bhikṣu in the midst of the saṅgha accepts and then denies, the bhikṣus should tell him:

original: ma rnyed pas na legs par ma rnyed kyi nyes pa rnyed kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du song la de'i rang bzhin tshol bar gsol cig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: ma rnyed pas na legs par ma rnyed kyi nyes pa rnyed kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du song la de'i rang bzhin tshol bar gsol cig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: “Venerable, you have not found what is good, you have found what is bad. Go to the saṅgha and request investigation of the nature of your offense.”

original: de'i dge 'dun gyi nang du song la de'i rang bzhin btsal ba gsol lo //
analyzed: de'i dge 'dun gyi nang du song la de'i rang bzhin btsal ba gsol lo //
translated: He should go to the saṅgha and request investigation of the nature of his offense.

original: dge 'dun gyis kyang chos dang / 'dul ba bzhin du de'i rang bzhin tshol ba dbog go zhes 'byung bas na /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis kyang chos dang / 'dul ba bzhin du de'i rang bzhin tshol ba dbog go zhes 'byung bas na /
translated: The saṅgha should grant investigation of the nature of his offense in accordance with the Dharma and the Vinaya.

original: gzhung las 'di skad du 'byung ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir gong ma skad du 'chad pa de mi rung bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: gzhung las 'di skad du 'byung ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir gong ma skad du 'chad pa de mi rung bar ston pa'o //
translated: This is taught in order to show that the above explanation is incorrect because it contradicts what appears in the treatise.

original: gal te gong ma ltar 'chad pa'i tshul yin na chad pa rnam pa bdun gyis dkyus su ci'i phyir ma smos she na /
analyzed: gal te gong ma ltar 'chad pa'i tshul yin na chad pa rnam pa bdun gyis dkyus su ci'i phyir ma smos she na /
translated: If the above is the way to explain, why is it not stated in the root text that the sevenfold investigation is for the sake of pacification?

original: zhi bar bya ba'i phyir tha dad du bya'o zhe na mi 'dod pas so zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: zhi bar bya ba'i phyir tha dad du bya'o zhe na mi 'dod pas so zhes pa yin te /
translated: If it is said that it is for the sake of pacification, this is unacceptable.

original: gong ma ltar de'i rang bzhin tshol ba yang zhi bar byed pa tsam du zad pas dkyus su ni de ltar ma smos so zhes zer na yang de ltar mi btub pa'i phyir mi rung bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: gong ma ltar de'i rang bzhin tshol ba yang zhi bar byed pa tsam du zad pas dkyus su ni de ltar ma smos so zhes zer na yang de ltar mi btub pa'i phyir mi rung bar ston pa'o //
translated: If it is said that the above investigation into its nature is merely for the sake of pacification, it is still not acceptable because it is not stated in the root text.

original: ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
translated: Why is it unacceptable?

original: spyo pa la sogs pa'ang de ltar ma bzhag pa'i phyir ro zhes pa yin te /
analyzed: spyo pa la sogs pa'ang de ltar ma bzhag pa'i phyir ro zhes pa yin te /
translated: It is said that it is unacceptable because scolding and so on are not presented in this way.

original: spyo ba la sogs pa'i tshad las kyang 'thab pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa lta bu yin mod kyi bdun gyi dkyus nas ma bkol ba'i phyir gong ma skad du bya ba yang mi rung ba'o //🔽de'i rang bzhin tshol ba de nyes par ma mthong ngo zhes zer ba'i phyir bsnyon pa'i chad pas gcod pa'o zhes zer na yang 'gal bar ston pa ni khas blangs shing bsnyon par ngo zin pa'i grags pa yang ma mthong bar 'gyur bas so zhes pa yin te
analyzed: spyo ba la sogs pa'i tshad las kyang 'thab pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa lta bu yin mod kyi bdun gyi dkyus nas ma bkol ba'i phyir gong ma skad du bya ba yang mi rung ba'o // de'i rang bzhin tshol ba de nyes par ma mthong ngo zhes zer ba'i phyir bsnyon pa'i chad pas gcod pa'o zhes zer na yang 'gal bar ston pa ni khas blangs shing bsnyon par ngo zin pa'i grags pa yang ma mthong bar 'gyur bas so zhes pa yin te
translated: But since this is not mentioned in the root text, it is not appropriate to add it.🔽If you say that the punishment is to be imposed because of the denial, then you would not see the denial and the fault as well known,🔽because you would see the denial and not see the fault as well known.

original: / de ltar bsnyon par mthong zhing nyes par grags pa yang ma mthong ngo zhes zer ba yin pas na /🔽bkar bas gcad pa la thug gi de'i rang bzhin tshol ba yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / de ltar bsnyon par mthong zhing nyes par grags pa yang ma mthong ngo zhes zer ba yin pas na / bkar bas gcad pa la thug gi de'i rang bzhin tshol ba yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, you would not impose the punishment because of the denial, but because of the fault.

original: med pa'i phyal por 'dug pa lta bur byas kyang bla ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyal por 'dug pa lta bur byas kyang bla ba'o //
translated: But even if you act as if you are a fool, it is better.

original: blang zhes pa dang / gtsug lag khang du gnas zhes pa ni gtsug lag khang phul na blang du rung ba dang gtsug lag khang du gnas par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: blang zhes pa dang / gtsug lag khang du gnas zhes pa ni gtsug lag khang phul na blang du rung ba dang gtsug lag khang du gnas par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The words accept and stay in the monastery mean that if the monastery is offered, it is proper to accept it, and that one should stay in the monastery.
